entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
